Text: This is a new Torrent upload, because it actually works. No more SAM Crashing with the other 4.9.2 upload. This one works!! Trusted!
Awesome stuff thank you. Hey I am using Ressurection Remix Rom for my sgs2, are you guys, 'Team Ressurection' part of the group that made that rom? Awesome thanks anyways you guys are legends.
Can you get the newest version or close to it, i had problems with 4.9.2 before, unless this fixed the problem , then i will try it out.

I found a great station on this app Tapinradio..

The station is: Urban Hitz Radio at 

http://www.urbanradiousa.com

I think the guy who runs it said that he uses SAM 4.90 or something like that. He said that SAM 4.9.2 had crashed for months, so he was unwilling to change back. I did not release this torrent, I simply searched long and hard at a pastebin for this.

Anyway check out that Radio station: Urban Hitz Radio, they play Urban Music, like Hip-Hop, etc.
I hope everyone enjoy and lets the community know how it is working out :) Have a great week...

thernb.com that is the site where you can find him. he is in Australia.

If you dont kno, FreeStreamHosting is giving away 1000  slots at 128kbps. And if you upgrade your account at $4.80 your server can be listed publicly. and you will be able to have direct links, so listeners can listen your stream, instead of using their free station page. Check it out: http://freestreamhosting.org/
Just a Tip, please stop using MySQL. That's the problems if SAM crashes. Use the default configuration for Firebird that comes shipped with SAM.
Thank you very much BagOfMoney! And yes, FreeStreamHosting is a very good site for any Internet radio station.
